channel.title: Physics on Stefano Giannini
channel.description: Recent content in Physics on Stefano Giannini

item.title: Electromagnetism
item.description: Maxwell Equations (Integral) Gauss’ Law: $$ \iint_{\partial \Omega} \mathbf{E} \cdot d\mathbf{S} = 4 \pi \iiint_{\Omega} \rho dV $$ Gauss’ Law for Magnetism: $$ \iint_{\partial \Omega} \mathbf{B} \cdot d\mathbf{S} = 0 $$ Maxwell-Faraday Equation: $$ \oint_{\partial \Omega} \mathbf{E} \cdot d\mathbf{l} = -\frac{d}{dt} \int_{\Sigma} \mathbf{B} \cdot d\mathbf{S} $$ Amp√®re’s circuital law: $$ \oint_{\partial \Omega} \mathbf{B} \cdot d\mathbf{l} = \mu_0 \left(\iint_{\Sigma} \mathbf{J} \cdot d\mathbf{S} + \epsilon_0 \frac{d}{dt} \iint_{\Sigma} \mathbf{E} \cdot d\mathbf{S}\right) $$
